creator: cstaylor@nanshu.com
text:
Because the webapplications are placed in the temporary directory for tomcat and
not opened in the main webapp directory, the server doesn't know to load them
again when the server restarts.

Changed to enhancement request.  This should be finished by the time 4.1 final
is completed.
creator: craig.mcclanahan@sun.com
remm@apache.org
text: The fix will be present in 4.1.3.
